messages.subject: Hi! I'm new here
messages.msgSnippet: bright blessings everyone, I am a married/SAHMum/attachment parent/home educator to 3 girls ages 14, 10 & 26 months! we ve been home educating for almost 5
messages.messageBody:
bright blessings everyone,

I am a married/SAHMum/attachment parent/home educator to 3 girls
ages 14, 10 & 26 months! we've been home educating for almost 5
years now. (feb. 17-99) we are eclectic when it comes to our
methods. we are unschoolers & live in wisconsin where it is very
easy to homeschool your child/ren.

Our family is also eclectic when it comes to
our spiritual paths. I (as well as my hubby & girls) am open to
Christianity & ALL earth based paths especially Celtic & Native
American.

GypsyWolf
